1.「……なるほど。| <pc>さんの手を 借りなければ| この本は 手に入らなかっ: ...I see. So without <pc>'s|help here, you would not have been able to|retrieve the book.

I've learned this secret technique for the|purpose of my disciples, but you may utilize|my services if you so wish, .|
|I will treat you whole-heartedly.
